Carter Kunstek

2519 Towering Ridge Lane · Florence, KY 41042 · 859.907.3800 · carterkunstek@gmail.com

School and sports instilled in me leadership and never being content. Growing up a middle child of 5 kids engraved in me independence and competition. My very first iPhone 3G sparked a passion for technology and a curiosity about how things work.

I'm a computer scientist with leadership experience, advanced interpersonal skills, and an internal drive to keep pushing forward. I want to be apart of the continual technological advancements that make the world a better, safer, and faster place for everyone.

Interests

Outside of work, school, and volunteering, I enjoy sports and working out. I played soccer and basketball my whole life until college, where I transitioned to intramural leagues with friends, which was even more fun at times. Beyond playing, I love watching, talking, and debating sports, especially with my favorite teams: Kentucky Wildcats (college), Indianapolis Pacers (NBA), Indianapolis Colts (NFL), and Liverpool (EPL).

When I can't be playing in intramurals, I still find a lot of joy and value in working out. Whether alone or with a friend, tiring myself out with exercising always helps clear my head and keep me sane.
